ygData.subject: RE: Paw advice
ygData.msgSnippet: No, he spawns right at the entrance to the dungeon on the 1st level and his name is Gynok Molter. Astur il Ayan, Cleric of Brell Solusek Ro
ygData.messageBody:
No, he spawns right at the entrance to the dungeon on the 1st level and his
name is Gynok Molter.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

>
> From: Sean.Stephen@...
>
> Hi,
> I am trying to get the Paw of Ophillia, Can someone tell me if the
> Named Mummy in Befallen who drops the Platinum ring spawns on the
> 3rd level
> just inside the hidden wall or not ?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Seanie,
> 31st High Elf Cleric , bristlebane
>
>
